name: Singles' Generation
description:
Singles' Generation is a visual novel story, which follows the life of a group of young friends, including their successes and failures in finding happiness and love, and finding their place in today’s fast-paced, modern world.
The game is heavily inspired by fan favourite sitcoms and tells the stories of the friends in a humorous way, in an episodic form.

Features:
-10 episodes
-40+ characters to meet throughout the story
-Several outfits for all characters
-Hundreds of photos to reflect the emotions and reactions of the characters in every situations
-Humorous dialogues
-Adjustable text speed to match your reading ability
-Optional audience reactions for a more immersive sitcom experience


Theme Song:
"I Don't Know" by The Tomboys
